title: SMC_SetAdditionalConversionFactors (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_SetAdditionalConversionFactors
Sets conversion factors for the dynamics of an axis.
Set values are multiplied by the factors before being sent
to the drive.
Actual values are divided by the factors after having been
received from the drive.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Factors are set on a rising edge.

rows: The conversion factor for the torque. Must not be 0.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: Signals that the factors have been set.

rows: Signals that the function block is working.
